    setTimeout('pingUserLiveStream()', 60000);

    function pingUserLiveStream()
    { 
            var url = "pingUserLiveStream.php";
            xmlHttp = GetXmlHttpObject(stateChanged);
            xmlHttp.open("GET", url , true);
            xmlHttp.send(null);
             setTimeout('pingUserLiveStream()', 60000);
    } 
    function stateChanged() 
    { 
        if (xmlHttp.readyState==4 || xmlHttp.readyState=="complete")
        { 
            var responseFlag = xmlHttp.responseText; 
            if(responseFlag == "Y")
            {
                document.getElementById("liveStreamIsOn").style.display = "inline";
                document.getElementById("liveStreamIsOff").style.display = "none";
            }
            if(responseFlag == "N")
            {
                document.getElementById("liveStreamIsOn").style.display = "none";
                document.getElementById("liveStreamIsOff").style.display = "inline";
            }

        }

    function GetXmlHttpObject(handler)
    { 
                var objXmlHttp=null

                    {
                        strName="Microsoft.XMLHTTP"
                    } 
                    try
                    { 
                        objXmlHttp=new ActiveXObject(strName)
                        objXmlHttp.onreadystatechange=handler 
                        return objXmlHttp
                    } 
                    catch(e)
                    { 
                        alert("Error. Scripting for ActiveX might be disabled") 
                        return 
                    } 
                } 
                if (navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mozilla")>=0)
                {
                    objXmlHttp=new XMLHttpRequest()
                    objXmlHttp.onload=handler
                    objXmlHttp.onerror=handler 
                    return objXmlHttp
                }
        }     
    
    </script>
